intro: Vellozia breviscapa, commonly known as the short-stemmed vellozia, is a unique flowering plant native to South America, particularly Brazil. It belongs to the family Podostomataceae and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers and specialized adaptations for aquatic environments. Vellozia breviscapa is of interest to botanists due to its evolutionary adaptations and ecological significance in its habitat.
